metadata.title: CVE-2024-0124 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in thenvdisam command line tool, where a user can cause nvdisasm to read freedmemory by running it on a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of thisvulnerability might lead to a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
